jsonOutputFormat.name: JSON Output Format
jsonOutputFormat.content: Return ONLY valid JSON (no markdown, no explanation, no code blocks).

appDetectionSchema.name: App Detection Schema
appDetectionSchema.content:
{
  "name": "Human readable app name",
  "description": "One sentence description",
  "uiPort": null or number,
  "apiPort": null or number,
  "startCommands": ["array of npm scripts"],
  "pm2ProcessNames": ["suggested PM2 process names"]
}

portDetectionRules.name: Port Detection Rules
portDetectionRules.content: Look for ports in: vite.config (server.port), .env files (PORT, VITE_PORT), package.json scripts with --port flags.

pm2NamingConvention.name: PM2 Naming Convention
pm2NamingConvention.content: Use lowercase hyphenated names. For full-stack apps use suffixes: app-name-ui, app-name-api.
